alert.note: Alert for Norfolk; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:50AM EST until January 14 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton MA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Massachusetts... Neponset River At Norwood affecting Norfolk and Suffolk Counties. For the Neponset River...including Norwood...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neponset River at Norwood. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs along the Neponset River in Norwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 9.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM EST.
